validate.email_invalid: Email address is not a valid email address.

management.title: User management
management.name: Name
management.message_confirm_delete_1: Do you want to delete selected user {{amount}} names at once?
management.message_confirm_delete_2: When user information is deleted, all linked information such as learning history will be deleted and it will not be possible to recover.
management.warning_delete_message: Are you sure you want to delete this user?

register_user.title: Register user
register_user.warning_submit_message: Are you sure you want to register user ?
register_user.pass_min_length: The password must be 8 single-byte characters or more.
register_user.new_pass_min_length: The new password must be 8 single-byte characters or more.
register_user.validate_letter: Password must contain both alphabets and halfsize numbers and over 8 characters.
register_user.validate_letter_new_password: New password must contain both alphabets and halfsize numbers and over 8 characters.
register_user.pass_invalid_letter: The password includes an invalid symbol (other than "!#$%&'*+-/=?^_`{|}~@.")
register_user.new_pass_invalid_letter: The new password includes an invalid symbol (other than "!#$%&'*+-/=?^_`{|}~@.")
register_user.pass_max_length: Password should contain at most 20 characters.
register_user.new_pass_max_length: New password should contain at most 20 characters.
register_user.fullNameKatakana_required: Full name (in English alphabet) cannot be blank.
register_user.useRole_not_exist: The user type is not valid.
register_user.userRole_onlyEmp: Member type can only be employee.
register_user.guide_loginId: *The 4 digits starting with the alphabet are your company code
register_user.guide_password: *At least 8 digits including English letters and single-byte numbers
register_user.guide_fullName: *Please put a double-byte space between your first and last name.
register_user.guide_fullName_furi: *Please put a double-byte space between your first and last name.

edit_user.title: Change user information
edit_user.warning_submit_message: Are you sure you want to change user information?
edit_user.error_change_role_last_admin: You can't edit this user role, as this user is currently the sole administrator of the company.

group_of_user.title: Assignment/removal of groups
group_of_user.name: Name
group_of_user.warning_assign_message_1: Are you sure you want to assign {{groupAmount}} group(s) to {{userAmount}} user(s)?
group_of_user.warning_assign_message_3: Are you sure you want to assign {{groupAmount}} attribute(s) to {{userAmount}} user(s)?
group_of_user.warning_assign_message_2: *The same groups are not assigned twice.
group_of_user.warning_remove_message: {{groupAmount}} group(s) will be removed from {{userAmount}} user(s). Will you continue?

attribute_of_user.warning_assign_message_2: *The same attribute are not assigned twice.
attribute_of_user.warning_remove_message: {{groupAmount}} attribute(s) will be removed from {{userAmount}} user(s). Will you continue?

login_status.name: Name
login_status.warning_change_message: The login status(es) of {{userAmount}} user(s) will be changed. Will you continue?

batch_register_user.title: Bulk registration of users (CSV)
batch_register_user.intro_register_text_1: Click "Download a CSV template" to download a CSV template.
batch_register_user.intro_register_text_2: Follow the instructions in "CSV input method" to write user information to be registered in a CSV template
batch_register_user.intro_register_text_3: Upload a CSV file with entries from this screen

batch_delete_user.intro_register_text_2: Follow the instructions in "CSV input method" to write user information to be deleted in a CSV template
batch_delete_user.warning_submit_message: Are you sure you want to delete the user?

group.message_confirm_delete: Will you delete all {{amount}} selected group(s)?
group.confirm_register: Are you sure you want to register a group ?
group.confirm_change: Are you sure you want to change group ?

attribute.message_confirm_delete: Will you delete all {{amount}} selected group(s)?

login_history_management.title: Login history list
login_history_management.number_of_active: Number of active users at login

guider.email_des: Please enter the employee's email within 50 characters.
guider.email_des_for_ws: Enter the employee's email within 50 characters. If you do not have an email, please enter your company code and login ID.
guider.fullname_des: Please enter the registrant name within 60 characters. It is necessary to put a double-byte space in the registrant name.
guider.password_des: Please enter the password with length is between 8 and 20 characters. And the password must contain both letters and numbers.
guider.furigana_des: Please enter the name (phonetic) within 60 characters. You need to put a double-byte space in the name (phonetic).
guider.job_des: Enter one of the following values: 「経営者」「役職者」「正社員」「非正規社員」「ビジネスパートナー」
guider.group_des: Enter the group name of the group that has already been registered in [Administrator screen> User management> Group registration / management]. You can enter multiple group names. Separate with ",".
guider.attribute_des: Enter the attribute name of the attribute name already registered in [Administrator screen> User management> Attribute registration / management]. You can enter multiple attribute names. Separate with ",".
guider.title: Title
guider.member_type: Please enter one of the following values: 「一般」「システム管理者」「サブ管理者」[チャンネル管理者]. Email is required when setting up a system administrator.
guider.signinId_des: Please enter the employee's login ID within 255 characters.
guider.signinId_des_not_required: Enter the employee's login ID within 255 characters. If you do not enter a login ID, your email address will be your login ID.
guider.pass_des: Please enter the employee's password within 20 characters. If you do not set a password, please enter your email.
guider.signinId_ws_des: Enter the employee's login ID within 255 characters. When registering for a workspace, please also enter your company code.
guider.company_code_des: Please enter the company code of the user to be registered.
guider.member_type_ws: Please enter one of the following values: 「一般」「サブ管理者」[チャンネル管理者].
guider.member_type_ws_virtual: Please enter one of the following values: 「一般」.
guider.employee_number_des: Please enter your employee number within 50 characters.
